columns.name: STOP_NUM
columns.description: The stop number within the shipment. Stop number = 1 is the pickup stop, and the max (stop number) for a shipment is the delivery stop.

columns.name: S_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the shipment ship unit.

columns.name: ACTIVITY
columns.description: The activity performed at the stop. For example: pickup, delivery, etc.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME
columns.description: The time spent performing the activity at the shipment stop.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The activity time unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The activity time in base units.

columns.name: IS_PERMANENT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator to define the stop as permanent. Any subsequent actions and modifications to the shipment will retain this record.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DWELL_TIME
columns.description: The ship unit dwell time at the stop location as entered.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DWELL_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The ship unit dwell time at the stop location in base UOM.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DWELL_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The ship unit dwell time unit of measure.
